attributes.action: Stop GCHQ violating and accessing the data from google and yahoo without their permission or indeed by the act of hacking
attributes.additional_details:
It has been stated that GCHQ is obtaining mass data from Google and yahoo by hacking their systems without their expressed permission. The information taken is belonging to the public who use their systems and GCHQ is also obtaining this private data without their expressed permission and breaches without doubt their freedom of rights and is simply hacked by a Government body as the offending hacker.

GCHQ and their breaches of the freedom of rights by doing this hacking should be discussed by Government, voted for to express the wishes of the people of the UK.

All future processes and systems should not undo the outcome of this debate and vote without a similar process
